member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_STATUS
member.summary: The WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_STATUS enumeration includes the status of a WebSocket close operation.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_STATUS.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_ENDPOINT_TERMINATED_CLOSE_STATUS
member.summary: The peer is going away and terminating the connection.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_STATUS.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_INVALID_DATA_TYPE_CLOSE_STATUS
member.summary: Invalid data received by the peer.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_STATUS.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_POLICY_VIOLATION_CLOSE_STATUS
member.summary: The message violates an endpoint's policy.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_STATUS.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_MESSAGE_TOO_BIG_CLOSE_STATUS
member.summary: The message sent was too large to process.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_STATUS.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_UNSUPPORTED_EXTENSIONS_CLOSE_STATUS
member.summary: A client endpoint expected the server to negotiate one or more extensions, but the server didn't return them in the response message of the WebSocket handshake.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_STATUS.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_SERVER_ERROR_CLOSE_STATUS
member.summary: An unexpected condition prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

summary.para: The TLS handshake could not be completed.
UTF-8 frame carried an invalid UTF-8 stream.
